eventName: The Sea Breeze on the Salt Flat
storyName: The Sea Breeze on the Salt Flat
storyInfo: Rhodes Island is handing over its Catastrophe detection system and medical center core components to Ægir, and Weedy is in charge of the handover, but she must first undergo vetting by the Inquisition.

attributes.content: Ahem... Here we are, Señorita Weedy.
attributes.name: Anxious Old Man

attributes.content: This vehicle is used by the Inquisition to transfer documents between courts. It will not be under much scrutiny. The official letters I gave you should ensure safe passage.
attributes.name: Anxious Old Man

attributes.content: The coachman can be trusted, but the best he can do for you is pretend to take a nap as you pass through the borderlands...
attributes.name: Anxious Old Man

attributes.content: Take this money too. It's what little savings I have left, after all's said and done. It should come in handy on your way back to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Anxious Old Man

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Go. Remember, you never saw me, and never visited the Salt Flat or Aarón. You've never returned to Iberia since you left...
attributes.name: Anxious Old Man

attributes.content: And once you're gone, never return again.
attributes.name: Anxious Old Man

attributes.content: Two days ago
We're here, Señorita Weedy.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: ...I thought a handover involving Iberia, Ægir, and Rhodes Island would be taking place more openly, like the lighthouse that has been relit.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I see. So the Inquisition is concerned about me.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You're clever.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: Rhodes Island will hand over the Catastrophe detection system and medical center core components to the two Ægir consuls...
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: Neither Iberia nor Ægir will keep official records of this handover. As such, it would be inconvenient for either Irene or Secunda to attend.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: And as a Rhodes Island operator who happens to be in Iberia, no one would be more qualified to oversee the handover. However—
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: 'However, you're suspected of associating with bandits and interfering with the Inquisition's administration of justice at Aarón'?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Or is it, 'starting with your grandfather, your entire family are considered criminals by the Inquisition'?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: No need to be so guarded. That era is in the past.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: But it remains the recent past, and some degree of vetting is still required.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: I expect you're familiar with this building?
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: Abuelo's old bionic lab.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: The Inquisition has sent all records associated with the Penia family's research here. Please review them so that we may archive them.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: Then, you may begin the handover.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: The accumulated records are quite voluminous. I've assigned a clerk to assist you... I'm sure he'll be of help.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: Someone who could help...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Once you see him, I'm sure you'll understand that the Inquisition is acting in good faith.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: Mm—*cough* *cough*.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I forgot you were allergic to dust... I should've cleaned the place. It's been in disuse for many years.
attributes.name: Old Clerk

attributes.content: I often saw you when I visited Abuelo here, Señor Callisto. Weren't you even more obsessed with cleanliness than I was?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Abuelo used to joke that your obsession with it was the only thing keeping you First Research Secretary, instead of taking his job.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Well, nowadays this old man is no more than a low-level clerk in the Inquisition, Señorita Weedy.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: If it weren't for my familiarity with these records, I wouldn't have even had the chance to leave my office... if you can call it that.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: So, how did you end up...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: L-Let's not talk about that, Señorita. We should begin.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: The Inquisition won't be giving either of us much time.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: This is the writ of sealing for the five bionic labs associated with the Penia family, one of which we're standing in right now. Please sign the last page once you've reviewed it.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: This is the notice of destruction of the relevant equipment. Please sign it too.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: This is... there's a lot of it.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I remember all these models and formulae...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Counting both published and unpublished, the Penia family has written a total of... 3782 papers on bionic science.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: What you're holding are the originals. All other extant copies have been destroyed.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: If you stacked them up, the originals alone must be almost as tall as I am... This must represent decades of work for Abuelo and the rest of you.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: After the Profound Silence, the Inquisition terminated all sea-related research in Iberia, but Señor Penia's bionics project went on until just a decade ago...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Compared to the thousands of projects snuffed out by the Inquisitors virtually overnight, we were the lucky ones.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Do you really think so?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: ...Another one, Señorita Weedy. Just sign on the last page if there's no issue.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: In the derelict lab, the old man buries himself in the mountain of records, taking out paper after paper, summarizing them, then handing them over to Weedy.
His head is bowed, and Weedy cannot see his expression.
Is this how all old clerks end up, once their personalities are worn away by years of mundane work?
Quiet, rigid, patient, refusing to communicate outside of work, unemotional... almost like a machine.
'Bart, Dimar... stand accused of conducting experiments banned by the Inquisition to satisfy their private desires, terrorizing the local population...'
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: '...sentenced to life in the Bastión de Cánticos for such heinous acts.'
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: These are...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: The judgments... of those who participated in the project.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Hearing those names seems to bring about a change in the old clerk's voice.
'Dorren, Castro, Liam... bodies discovered in the Salt Flat after attempting to flee Iberia.'
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Please review and sign—
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: 'Clara...'
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: 'Guilty of stealing Inquisition records and disseminating confidential experiment data without authorization... sentenced to ten years in the Bastión de Cánticos... died of illness during incarceration.'
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Clara... that Liberi lady with the golden hair? I remember that you and her...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: (Whispers) Pale gold.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: She had just come to the lab from Perdon. She was innocent, lively, pretty, and her cheer was infectious. Everyone wanted to talk to her.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: She helped us organize our data, while secretly developing a hair dye out of the seaweed we used in our experiments...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: I could always smell a faint aroma when she walked past, one that reminded me of... the sea.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: She wasn't the kind of person they're saying she was, right?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: She just wanted to preserve the lab's research, the things that everyone poured their hearts and souls into...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Does it matter?
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: The Inquisition needs justifications to shut down such a large research project. Whether they're true or not, nobody cares.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: But she was your...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I'm lucky I wasn't implicated because of my relationship with Clara and your grandfather. The Inquisition gave me a path forward...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: I-I'm very grateful to them.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Grateful?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Th-There is still much to do! Let's get back to the work at hand, Señorita.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: (Softly) *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: The next thing to review is...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: The main component of the lab's core project. In the original concept, it supported systems that could quickly sequence the genomes of marine creatures and create samples.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: It... It's not supposed to exist, not anymore...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: The old man finally moves away from the mountain of papers, taking the tiny component from Weedy.
Weedy sees his expression—disbelief, realization, shock, scorn, pain, sorrow... A thousand emotions fill the face that was blank a moment ago.
'Disaster-bringing research'... 'corrupter of hearts'... 'beacon for the tides'...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: So the Inquisition never destroyed the thing they called disaster-bringing research... They wanted me to see it—no, for you to see it again...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: What are they thinking?!
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Are you still unwilling to talk, Señor?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: I don't care what the Inquisition intends. Temptation, scrutiny, control—Iberians have long been used to such things...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: What I care about is you, Señor.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I don't think you're just an emotionless puppet. From the moment you stepped into this lab, I'd been waiting...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Waiting to truly meet you again.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Señorita...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Don't worry, Leaf has already confirmed that there's no one else here.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I—I'm here to send you away from Iberia.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: The old man grabs Weedy's sleeve and gazes straight into her eyes. His eyes are sharp and strong, as though he's become a different person.
You should not have come back.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: We were fortunate to have connections in the Inquisition, which allowed Señor Penia to get advanced warning. He leveraged all the connections he had to get you out of Iberia...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: With dignity.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I'd wanted to leave Iberia and see what was outside. I remember it being a smooth process, but the Inquisitor who processed my documents said it would be hard to come back once I left.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: None of that matters anymore.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Do not believe the finshit the Inquisitors tell you... 'That era is in the past'?
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: No, it's not. Even if land and sea have joined hands again, even if your company is in a position to do business in Iberia.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: The Inquisition, their arrogance and tyranny, their cruelty and hypocrisy... None of it has changed.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Look at all these scrolls and records, this component that should have been destroyed...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: I have no doubt now. Once you finish your business with Rhodes Island, they will demand that you forget everything that's happened, and that you restart the bionics research.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: As though—*cough *cough*—as though the crimes they committed, the shame and despair we felt, as though none of that ever existed!
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Please, calm down. Are you alright?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: That's why, when that desgraciado told me you'd returned and ordered me to assist you, I knew I must send you away again!
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: The old man ignores Weedy's words and keeps talking.
All the years I've spent on my knees have broken them, Señorita, but I've gotten a few things out of this...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Before I came, I spent my last savings to get my hands on some forged official letters that will get you past the checkpoints, and buttered up the powers that be...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: You will leave Iberia tonight.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You can't fool the Inquisition. It won't be long until they find out.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: None of it matters, as long as you're away from this country.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: But the Inquisition will have your head!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: No, Señorita Weedy—I will have THEIR heads.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Bart, Dimar...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Dorren, Castro, Liam...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Clara... oh, dear Clara...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: And your grandfather, Señor Penia... The lab is no more. Our science is no more. All that's left is a reputation in tatters...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: And an old man by the name of Callisto who yet lives, guarding these ruins.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: I've been waiting for a chance!
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: You mean, me?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I'll send you away, and wait for the alguacil and the Inquisitors to come here and draw their swords at me in anger, just like they once did!
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Then—*cough* then...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: I will spit my blood on the faces of those malditos one last time!
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: The old man screams until his voice is rasp, but he continues to clutch the component in its hand. Its sharp edges pierce his palms, which have become red with blood.
But the man continues to rage, as though it is the only emotion his feeble body can house.
As though this emotion has kept him alive all these years.
Promise me, Señorita!
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: I promise, Señor Callisto.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I'll go.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: And once you're gone, never return again.
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Get on, Señorita. I must get back to the lab. The Inquisition will be there any moment...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Alright... Leaf!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Pack up Señor Callisto and put him in the trunk... carefully.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: L-Let me go—what is the meaning of this?
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: The money and the letters are right next to you. I've talked to the coachman, who will take a little detour, where you'll be met by a colleague of mine...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: A Liberi with a bright smile and a joking attitude, with a red streak in his white hair.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: He'll send you back to your old home... the town of Luarca you used to tell me about, on the fringes of the Salt Flat, where people dance around a bonfire at night.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You can't do this! You promised me at the lab!
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: ...Sorry, I lied.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: If I didn't, you'd have gone and found an Inquisitor to fight to the death, wouldn't you?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I'm an operator of Rhodes Island. Our continued existence depends on this handover. I must remain in Iberia to complete my mission.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Whatever the Inquisition meant by 'vetting', I'll find out myself.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Señorita—Weedy—girl! My body is like a piece of withered wood! I don't have many years left! Just let me fulfill this last wish...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Exactly! You don't have many years left.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Don't you realize, Señor? It's not just the Inquisition that's imprisoned you. It's also you yourself.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I still remember hearing you talk about why you joined the lab—the way you imagined massive bionic fins that would let us freely sail the seas...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: But now, your memories contain only pain and hatred.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I want you to go home, even if you only have the time to taste the briny winds of the Salt Flat, to watch the saltfins leap from the salt...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: To talk to the young people dancing around the fire...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: To sleep soundly on a rocking chair...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I want you to live your last days in peace.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Let this vehicle bring the story of Penia Lab and everything my grandfather directed to a close, whether it's the sin the Inquisition claims it was, or the miscarriage of justice you believe it to be.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You'll just let it go? Just like that?
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Say goodbye to Señor Callisto, Leaf.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: The bionic seadragon sways in front of the old man as though it is dancing.
This is...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Could this be... a bionic seadragon...
attributes.name: Callisto

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: It pales in comparison to what your team once achieved, but Leaf is indeed a product of bionic technology.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Science does not end because someone rejects it, nor does it depend on being recognized to continue.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: This is my way, and how I'll talk to them.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Adios, Señor.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Weedy takes a couple of steps back and pats the vehicle.
—Now go, Coachman.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: The old man says no more. Leaning against the interior of the vehicle, he gazes out the window at Weedy and the land behind her, until it all grows distant and blurred.
He gazes blankly, as though he has never known the girl, delicate yet strong; as though he has never known this land, never known... himself.
Let's go, Leaf.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: We have a lot to do.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Doña Irene.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Señorita Weedy has made a last-minute demand...
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: She wants the Inquisition to promise not to pursue the case of Señor Callisto?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: I see no reason to refuse.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: It seems you've misunderstood something.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Wh-What is it, Doña?
attributes.name: Inquisition Official

attributes.content: Vetting is indeed crucial for this handover of the Rhodes Island Catastrophe detection system and medical center core components, for it is of great importance to both land and sea.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: But it is not just Operator Weedy of Rhodes Island who is being put to the test. You and I, and the Inquisition itself... we are all being tested. Think about it.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: ...How we should face the past, and how we should approach the future in this new era.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Wrap up the vetting process for Operator Weedy. She has demonstrated that she is more than just the descendant of a sinner, or an obsessed scientist.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Inquisition Official
